long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: After the extension is installed, it operates in the background, continuously monitoring every URL you access in real-time. The interface presents the total count of distinct URLs visited, in addition to the count of unique URLs visited during the current browsing session. By clicking the extension icon in your browser, you can quickly check this tally.
